price: ߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒߠߋ ߕߍ߫ ߒ ߕߌ߲ ߓߌߘߌ߲߫ ߡߐ߰ ߛߌ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߌ ߞߊ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߘߊ߲߫ ߣߊ߰ߘߌ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߓߐ߰ ߘߐߕߐ߬ߞߎ߬ߟߐ߬ߣߍ߲ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قَالَ لَمۡ أَكُن لِّأَسۡجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla lam akun li-asjuda libasharin khalaqtahu min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
